options.command: python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -U pip && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-build.txt

bash -c 'unset npm_config_prefix; mkdir -p dist/apps/worker/linux/amd64 && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -f apps/worker/Dockerfile.linux --target artifact --output type=local,dest=dist/apps/worker/linux/amd64 .'

bash -lc 'unset npm_config_prefix; mkdir -p ../../dist/apps/worker/macos/arm64 && rm -rf /tmp/worker-pyinstaller-build && .venv/bin/pyinstaller --clean --onefile --name worker --distpath ../../dist/apps/worker/macos/arm64 --workpath /tmp/worker-pyinstaller-build src/worker/__main__.py'
